discuss
property
string $id The PHP session ID of the User
property
int $user The ID of the disUser attached to this Session
property
int $access The last time this session was active
property
int $startedon The time this session was started
property
int $ttl The time-to-live on this session, or how many seconds from the startedon time until it expires
property
string $place The last-visited place by this session user
